name: Neutrals 7-Day Set Reusable Makeup Wipes
ingredients: 100% Polyester, No Added Chemicals, Free Of Alcohol, Oils, Astringents, Parabens, Fragrances, and Sulfates.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Machine wash hot and dry with your towel load. .-Fabric-softener and dryer-sheet safe..-Soak in warm water—the warmer, the wetter, the better..-Use the short-fiber side to erase makeup in gentle circular motions..-Flip to long-fiber side (side with tag) to exfoliate. .-Continue in gentle circular motions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This set is sooo cute and absolutely perfect for gifting!! It is two boxes within a shared box so you can open and split it up to give to two lucky people in your life! I am gifting one to my mother-in-law and keeping the other for myself. They are sooo soft and a great functional size. Very affordable compared to buying just one from this brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are amazing! Bought these as a second set. My first ones lasted 3-4 years and totally beats the make up wipes, which can leave gunk behind on your face. Totally removed all makeup without soap, including mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Guys- these are literally $1 each at Aldi… the EXACT same thing without the name brand. Please don’t waste money on these.
Love these! They work so so well! I use them with just water to remove my makeup.
